metadata.title: CVE-2019-17264 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** In libyal liblnk before 20191006, liblnk_location_information_read_data in liblnk_location_information.c has a heap-based buffer over-read because an incorrect variable name is used for a certain offset. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in the GitHub issue.

criterions.comment: liblnk package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
